allTitles: {"en":"Avoid Covid-19","swh":"Epuka ugonjwa wa virusi vya Korona"}

0.swh: Epuka ugonjwa wa virusi vya Korona

4.swh: Epuka ugonjwa wa virusi vya Korona

5.eng:
Illustrations:  Ari and Elaine Vitikainen 

Information was taken from WHO websites such as https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/advice-for-public

Version 6/4/2020

7.eng: Translated into Swahili by Heri Mwanjalanje

10.eng: Nawa mikono yako mara kwa mara kila siku kwa maji na sabuni, au kwa maji yenye dawa ya kuua wadudu (sanitizer).

11.eng: Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth.
11.swh: Epuka kugusa macho, pua na mdomo.

12.eng: Cover your nose and mouth with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze. Dispose of the used tissue immediately.
12.swh: Funika mdomo na pua yako kwa mkunjo wa kiwiko cha mkono au kwa tishu wakati unapokohoa au kupiga chafya. Tupa tishu iliyotumika mara moja.

13.eng:
Maintain a distance of 2 meters between yourself and others. 
Avoid unnecessary travel and stay away from large groups of people.
13.swh: Kaa umbali wa mita 2 kati yako na mtu mwingine. Epuka safari zisizo za lazima pamoja na mikusanyiko mikubwa ya watu.

14.eng:
Stay at home if you feel unwell.
If you have a fever, cough or difficulty breathing, seek medical attention early.
14.swh: Kaa nyumbani kama hujisikii vizuri. Kama unaumwa kichwa, unakohoa au unapumua kwa shida, umwone daktari mapema.

15.eng:
Stay informed about the latest developments on COVID-19. 
Find information from reliable
sources and  follow the advice given by your healthcare provider.
15.swh: Jaribu kupata habari zaidi juu ya yale yanayotokea juu ya ugonjwa wa Korona. Fuata ushauri unaotolewa na wahudumu wa afya.

bookText.eng:
Avoid Covid-19


                                           


Avoid Covid-19
Illustrations:  Ari and Elaine Vitikainen 

Information was taken from WHO websites such as https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/advice-for-public

Version 6/4/2020
Literacy for Women in Africa
Translated into Swahili by Heri Mwanjalanje


Nawa mikono yako mara kwa mara kila siku kwa maji na sabuni, au kwa maji yenye dawa ya kuua wadudu (sanitizer).
Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth.

Cover your nose and mouth with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze. Dispose of the used tissue immediately.



Maintain a distance of 2 meters between yourself and others. 
Avoid unnecessary travel and stay away from large groups of people. 



Stay at home if you feel unwell.
If you have a fever, cough or difficulty breathing, seek medical attention early.


Stay informed about the latest developments on COVID-19. 
Find information from reliable
sources and  follow the advice given by your healthcare provider.
bookText.swh:
Epuka ugonjwa wa virusi vya Korona



Epuka ugonjwa wa virusi vya Korona






Epuka kugusa macho, pua na mdomo.
Funika mdomo na pua yako kwa mkunjo wa kiwiko cha mkono au kwa tishu wakati unapokohoa au kupiga chafya. Tupa tishu iliyotumika mara moja.
Kaa umbali wa mita 2 kati yako na mtu mwingine. Epuka safari zisizo za lazima pamoja na mikusanyiko mikubwa ya watu.
Kaa nyumbani kama hujisikii vizuri. Kama unaumwa kichwa, unakohoa au unapumua kwa shida, umwone daktari mapema.
Jaribu kupata habari zaidi juu ya yale yanayotokea juu ya ugonjwa wa Korona. Fuata ushauri unaotolewa na wahudumu wa afya.

summary: Basic information on how to avoid Coronavirus (Covid-19)
title: Epuka ugonjwa wa virusi vya Korona
